column2:
"I've already tried to cool my thoughts
and mind but I don’t feel cool at all...
Crap, they are just coined words!"

"Well, I don't suppose I have time to
bother with the heat once the battle
begins so that's it, I guess."

"Alright alright, let's go on and lead the
way while trying not to focus too much
on the heat!"

"心頭滅却したはずなのに
全然涼しくない……
くそ、所詮は造語かっ！"

"ま、戦い始めたら暑さを気にしてる
ヒマなんてないし、いいかな。"

"さあさ、暑さを忘れるくらい集中して
ガンガン先導してってよねー！"
